meanings.definition: A person who responds or makes a reply.
meanings.sent1: The responders quickly answered the phone call.
meanings.sent2: The responders in the debate had different opinions.
meanings.sent3: The responders at the party were the most talkative guests.
meanings.sent4: She was a quick responder to any question thrown her way.
meanings.sent5: The responders in the class were always eager to participate.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism that responds to a signal or stimulus.
meanings.sent1: The automatic doors are great responders to movement.
meanings.sent2: The responders in the experiment reacted to the changes.
meanings.sent3: The smartwatch was a funny responder to his gestures.
meanings.sent4: The sensor was a silent responder to the slightest touch.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock was a reliable responder to his wake-up call.

meanings.definition: A type of emergency worker who responds to calls for help.
meanings.sent1: The firefighters are brave responders in times of need.
meanings.sent2: The medical responders arrived quickly at the accident scene.
meanings.sent3: The police responders had a funny mishap during training.
meanings.sent4: The paramedic was a guardian angel, a true responder in emergencies.
meanings.sent5: The search and rescue responders were heroes in the storm.
